parameters.description: The tests for the test case
The message bus to send execution messages to
The display name of the test case
The skip reason, if the test case is being skipped
The user's choice on how to treat explicit tests
The constructor arguments for the test class

content.value: public class XunitTestCaseRunnerContext : XunitTestCaseRunnerBaseContext<IXunitTestCase, IXunitTest>, IAsyncLifetime, IAsyncDisposable
Public Class XunitTestCaseRunnerContext Inherits XunitTestCaseRunnerBaseContext(Of IXunitTestCase, IXunitTest) Implements IAsyncLifetime, IAsyncDisposable

inheritedMembers.summary: Gets the aggregator used for reporting exceptions.
Gets the cancellation token source used for cancelling test execution.
Gets a flag which indicates how explicit tests should be handled.
Gets the message bus to send execution engine messages to.
Performs application-defined tasks associated with freeing, releasing, or resetting unmanaged resources asynchronously.
Called immediately after the class has been created, before it is used.
